description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(152).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,74,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: -(x^2-3*x-1) / (x^4-74*x^2+1). - _Colin Barker_, Nov 14 2013a(n) = 74*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 14 2013
mathematica: Denominator[Convergents[Sqrt[152], 30]] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 14 2013 *)LinearRecurrence[{0,74,0,-1},{1,3,73,222},30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 03 2015 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,3,73,222]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 74*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 14 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
